snippet: H Partners, an activist hedge fund, called for the ouster of Tempur Sealy’s chief executive and board, claiming the mattress maker has suffered from years of mismanagement.
abstract: H Partners, an activist hedge fund, called for the ouster of Tempur Sealy’s chief executive and board, claiming the mattress maker has suffered from years of mismanagement.

headline.main: Activist Investor Demands Change at Tempur Sealy
